module.title: Work: Missions
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%prefix%>missions`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%prefix%>missions` ( `missionId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `priority` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `day` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `content` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `reference` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`missionId`), KEY `daysLeft` (`day`), KEY `priority` (`priority`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
